about_the_game:
Customise Nyanza's appearance with the following items: Evil Horns
This item is included in the Kitaria Fables: Deluxe Edition bundle.
This item is included in the Demon Kitty Outfit bundle.
detailed_description:
Customise Nyanza's appearance with the following items: Evil Horns
This item is included in the Kitaria Fables: Deluxe Edition bundle.
This item is included in the Demon Kitty Outfit bundle.
legal_notice: © PQube Ltd. Developed by Twin Hearts. Published by PQube Ltd.
name: Kitaria Fables - Evil Horns

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64 bit Windows 10 / 8 / 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD FX-8150 3.6GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti / Radeon HD 6790 2GB VRAM*
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64 bit Windows 10 / 8 / 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 3.2 GHz / AMD Ryzen 5 1600X 3.6GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / Radeon HD 7950 3GB VRAM*
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard

short_description: Customise Nyanza's appearance with the following items: Evil Horns
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil
